job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a QA Engineer for one of our Java-based teams who's proficient in testing enterprise-scale software, ready to learn and grow, and interested in facing and overcoming technical challenges. You will work as part of a distributed agile team developing and testing the RWS software. The fast-paced agile development cycle will require you to use several testing approaches, design and write test automation code as well as executing manual testing. You will be a part of a product team that consists of highly skilled and experienced Java developers and QA engineers and work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software.

   Our teams build scalable Java microservices based on Spring, JPA 2.0, OpenSearch, GraphQL, OpenAPI RESTful web service and more to support our Tridion Content Management products. These microservices are provided to customers on-premise and supported in the cloud using Docker-based AWS container services. Our services run on popular RDBMS' and OpenSearch.

   Our Content Management software runs at customers serving millions of page views per day served by hundreds of servers. Our customers include many big-name brands. So, you can imagine the technological challenges we face in order to provide a scalable architecture that not only does what customers want, but also performs well. We did a pretty good job so far: we are a leader in the Structured content management area. But to stay on top, we are looking to expand with talented QA Engineer to help define and drive technical initiatives to keep the platform current and more efficient., * Create test plans based on Risk-based testing technique
     * Define the required QA coverage for the stories in the team Grooming and Planning meetings
     * Execute automated and manual tests in accordance with the test plan
     * Configure environments for testing purposes
     * Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle
     * Define the scope of regression testing for every release using a Risk-based approach
     * Design and create automated test cases in the Java automation suite
     * Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation
     * Design and monitor nightly runs of automated tests
     * Design and execute performance tests
     * Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results
job_details.full_text:
QA Engineer

We are looking for a QA Engineer for one of our Java-based teams who's proficient in testing enterprise-scale software, ready to learn and grow, and interested in facing and overcoming technical challenges. You will work as part of a distributed agile team developing and testing the RWS software. The fast-paced agile development cycle will require you to use several testing approaches, design and write test automation code as well as executing manual testing. You will be a part of a product team that consists of highly skilled and experienced Java developers and QA engineers and work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software.

   Our teams build scalable Java microservices based on Spring, JPA 2.0, OpenSearch, GraphQL, OpenAPI RESTful web service and more to support our Tridion Content Management products. These microservices are provided to customers on-premise and supported in the cloud using Docker-based AWS container services. Our services run on popular RDBMS' and OpenSearch.

   Our Content Management software runs at customers serving millions of page views per day served by hundreds of servers. Our customers include many big-name brands. So, you can imagine the technological challenges we face in order to provide a scalable architecture that not only does what customers want, but also performs well. We did a pretty good job so far: we are a leader in the Structured content management area. But to stay on top, we are looking to expand with talented QA Engineer to help define and drive technical initiatives to keep the platform current and more efficient., * Create test plans based on Risk-based testing technique
     * Define the required QA coverage for the stories in the team Grooming and Planning meetings
     * Execute automated and manual tests in accordance with the test plan
     * Configure environments for testing purposes
     * Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle
     * Define the scope of regression testing for every release using a Risk-based approach
     * Design and create automated test cases in the Java automation suite
     * Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation
     * Design and monitor nightly runs of automated tests
     * Design and execute performance tests
     * Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional QA engineering for Java-based enterprise software, including manual testing, test automation, and performance testing. While it mentions microservices, AWS, and OpenSearch, it does not involve the core responsibilities or technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles, such as algorithm development, predictive modeling, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning. The role is primarily about ensuring the quality of existing software rather than developing AI models or AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves designing and writing test automation code, which is a form of software development focused on testing.
job_tasks.phrase: design and write test automation code

job_tasks.justification: Creating automated test cases is a software development activity.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and create automated test cases in the Java automation suite

job_tasks.justification: Identifying opportunities for test automation falls under the umbrella of improving the software development lifecycle through automation.
job_tasks.phrase: Seek out and identify opportunities for test automation

job_tasks.justification: Designing and monitoring automated test runs is part of the software development and maintenance process for testing.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and monitor nightly runs of automated tests

job_tasks.justification: Designing and executing performance tests is a specialized area within software development focused on system performance.
Analyzing performance test results and providing comprehensible results is a key part of the software development process for performance tuning.
job_tasks.phrase: Analyze performance test results and provide comprehensible results

job_tasks.justification: Creating test plans based on risk assessment is a way to align testing efforts with business priorities and potential impacts.
job_tasks.phrase: Create test plans based on Risk-based testing technique

job_tasks.justification: Defining QA coverage in grooming and planning meetings requires understanding the business value and scope of stories.
job_tasks.phrase: Define the required QA coverage for the stories in the team Grooming and Planning meetings

job_tasks.justification: Defining regression testing scope using a risk-based approach involves understanding business impact and priorities.
job_tasks.phrase: Define the scope of regression testing for every release using a Risk-based approach

job_tasks.justification: Executing manual tests is a fundamental part of ensuring software quality, often considered alongside automated testing.
Configuring environments for testing is a necessary step for executing tests, often involving scripting or setup tasks.
Coordinating with developers, reproducing issues, and managing defects are integral parts of the software development lifecycle, particularly in QA.
job_tasks.phrase: Co-ordinate with the developers, reproduce issues when required, and steer the defect through its lifecycle

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working with Java developers and QA engineers to deliver software, indicating involvement in the software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: work closely with them to deliver high-quality and innovative software

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions developing and testing microservices, which are core components of modern software development.
job_tasks.phrase: developing and testing the RWS software

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as a QA Engineer for Java-based teams, implying a focus on the quality assurance aspect of software development.
